attributes.action: legalise the prescription of CBD marijana for medicinal purposes
attributes.additional_details:
A UK citizen should be offered the same medication that is available elsewhere after being diagnosed with a terminal illness. If medical maijana does have any healing properties why is it not available?
My dad has been diagnosed with Lung cancer and we will as a family try this oil but why is it not available here in the uk. ??? There are people all over the world making and testing this with success stories all over the internet.
attributes.background: Israel along with many other countries are prescribing Cannabis oil as medicine for cancer patients, Tikum Olam being the largest and foremost supplier of medical Cannabis. I think that uk residents should be given a choice.There are so many desperate people looking at the internet for hope.
